entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
